notes.text: We've resolved an issue where the chart measure wasn't visible in the Evening Horizon theme
You can now configure the settings of related apps using the extension controller
We've resolved an issue where navigating back to the object page from a draft entity after activation using a determining action caused errors
Delete button visibility on subobject page tables is now controlled by DeleteRestriction through NavigationRestriction
InvokeActions extension API now executes in strict mode and handles HTTP status code 412 (Precondition Failed) responses with a confirmation dialog
